statement_text: This [crossing a new frontier] is because the pathogenic avian influenza (HPAI) has just crossed a new frontier, a new study reported.

rationale: 'crossed a new frontier' is a metaphor but not one of the potent metaphors listed. 'pathogenic' is technical.
statement_text: This [crossing a new frontier] is because the pathogenic avian influenza (HPAI) has just crossed a new frontier, a new study reported.
